attention1.ptxt: Be sure to read Precautions for Discharge Headlight Service (If Equipped) carefully before working. Neglecting them may result in personal injury.

s1.ptxt: Remove ballast referring to Ballast Removal and Installation .
Remove cover (1) from headlight housing by turning it counterclockwise.
Remove igniter (2) from discharge headlight bulb by turning it counterclockwise.
After disconnecting ground wire (1), pull out igniter (2) from headlight housing.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure noting the following.

item.ptxt: After installation, be sure to inspect and adjust aiming referring to Headlight Aiming Adjustment with Screen .
